text.title: Tonglu
text.head: Tonglu
text.p:
Tonglu
is a city in
Zhejiang
.
text.head: Understand
text.p:
Tonglu is a country seat situated on the upper Fuchun River , which is the head water of Qiantang River that flows into
Hangzhou
. Tonglu has more than 400,000 inhabitants .
text.head: By plane
text.p:
The main international hub for the region is Shanghai
Pudong Airport
.
Hangzhou Airport
is closer ; it has flights to most major Chinese cities and some international flights .
text.head: By train
text.p:
The closest train connection is in Hangzhou , where you can catch a fast
bullet train
to Hongqiao station in Shanghai or south toward
Ningbo
and
Fujian
.
text.head: By bus or car
text.p: From Hangzhou you can take a bus or drive a private vehicle along motorways G2501/G25 or G320 . Get off at the Tonglu exit .
text.head: See
text.p: Tonglu is where you can escape the polluted cities of the north , take a stroll through nature , and experience cultural heritage , such as opera , embroidery and ceramics .

list.item: Some notable natural destinations include Baiyunyuan , Babisong , Yaolinxianjing , Langshijintang and Yangshanfan .

Fenshui
is the largest suburb of Tonglu . Fenshui is about 30 km from Tonglu downtown . Also , down along the Fuchun River .

Daqishan National Forest Park
would the first option for visitors interested in nature . Mount Daqi is near downtown Tonglu and is accessible via public bus and taxi , or on foot . Daqishan has crystal clear streams and pools , diverse vegetation , gigantic but lifelike rocks , uncountable types of birds and tiny insects , and fresh air .

Local villages include
Yanshanfan Village
and
Hengcun Village
, which have special festivals at certain times of the year . Hengcun has a festival every March 8th of the Lunar calendar . Yangshanfan Village will have a Follower Festival that is always held in the spring when Peach Blossoms bloom across the countryside . During the festival you can stroll through the mountains and enjoy performances put on by locals .

text.head: Do
text.p: You can get rest in Tonglu . Take your time enjoy your holiday in nature . If you visit Tonglu in spring and all the flowers come out , you will fall in love with this city .
If you like doing sports , Tonglu is also a good place for you . The Tonglu Sports Centre is fully equipped .
text.head: Buy
text.p: You can buy fresh produce from local farmers at green grocers around the city . Traditional gifts for such as embroideries and ceramics are also plentiful .
General goods can be bought large supermarkets around the city .
text.head: Eat
text.p: There is delicious food in Tonglu . In different part of Tonglu , there are different tastes . But most of them are 辣的 . You can find many interesting foods in small 弄堂 . There are barbecues and Quji duck heads and Yongkang meat pie .
text.head: Drink
text.p: You can go to ( 子曰的甜品屋 ) and the dessert is really good !
text.head: Sleep
text.p: There are many hotels in Tonglu , like Lijun , Xinkaiyuan , Luoma , and Honglou .
